verses.verse: See how <S%H2896>good<s%> and how <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> it is for <S%H251>brothers<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in <S%H3162>unity!<s%>

It is like the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on the <S%H7218>head,<s%> that ran <S%H3381>down<s%> on the <S%H2206>beard,<s%> even <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H2206>beard;<s%> that came <S%H3381>down<s%> on the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of his <S%H4060>robes;<s%>

like the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> that comes <S%H3381>down<s%> on the <S%H2042>hills<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> for there <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>gives<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> even <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>
